activities: SERVICE 800 uses personal data pertaining to present and former personnel and its international affiliates in connection with the management and operation of its business, making services and benefits available to such personnel, and maintaining contact with former personnel. SERVICE 800 uses personal data obtained from or relating to prospective and current clients and their personnel to provide and offer services to such clients. SERVICE 800 uses personal data to survey individuals who work at its client companies’ customers about specific service experiences.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
